attributes.action: Include the option to state 'English Citizen' on the 2011 Census form
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current format of Census Form includes options to state that people are Welsh, Scottish Irish and various other nationalities but there is no option to state that you are English, there is only the option for British, The majority of the population who will be required by law to complete the census are English they should have the right to state this on the census form

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
